targets.rawSql:
select distinct sensor_name, latitude, longitude
from sensors
where type = 'temperature'
and match(type, '^(${sensor_type:pipe})$')
and match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')

select distinct sensor_name, latitude, longitude
from sensors
where type = 'traffic'
and match(type, '^(${sensor_type:pipe})$')
and match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')

select distinct sensor_name, latitude, longitude
from sensors
where type = 'recycling_points'
and match(type, '^(${sensor_type:pipe})$')
and match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')

select sensor_name, type, max(last_message) as last_message
from sensors
where match(type, '^(${sensor_type:pipe})$')
and match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')
group by sensor_name, type
order by last_message, type

with sensors_by_type as (
    select sensor_name, type, max(last_message) as last_message
    from sensors
    group by sensor_name, type
)
select type, count(sensor_name) as count
from sensors_by_type
where match(type, '^(${sensor_type:pipe})$')
group by type

SELECT sensor_name, value, timestamp
FROM sensors.temperatures
where match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')
order by timestamp desc

select avg_temperature as "Temperature", date, sensor_name
from sensors.temperatures_5m
where match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')

SELECT sensor_name, avg_speed, vehicles, timestamp
FROM sensors.traffic
where match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')
order by timestamp desc

select vehicles as "N. vehicles", date, sensor_name
from sensors.traffic_1h
where match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')

select speed as "Avg. speed", date, sensor_name
from sensors.traffic_1h
where match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')

SELECT sensor_name, filling, timestamp
FROM sensors.recycling_points
where match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')
order by timestamp desc

select avg_filling as Filling, date, sensor_name
from sensors.recycling_points_5m
where match(sensor_name, '^(${sensor_name:pipe})$')
order by sensor_name

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_name
FROM sensors
WHERE match(type, '^(${sensor_type:pipe})$')
list.label: Sensor
list.name: sensor_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_name
FROM sensors
WHERE match(type, '^(${sensor_type:pipe})$')
